subject: Football
lead_paragraph: When Geno Smith shredded Buffalo for 331 yards and 2 touchdowns on Sept. 22, the Bills played without two starters: safety Jairus Byrd and cornerback Stephon Gilmore. Both are now healthy.
snippet: When Geno Smith shredded Buffalo for 331 yards and 2 touchdowns on Sept. 22, the Bills played without two starters: safety Jairus Byrd and cornerback Stephon Gilmore. Both are now healthy.
